CustomField.description: Allows the LLM to call multiple tools in a single turn. Improves performance for complex requests but risks governor limit stacking. Has no effect on Workflow agents — parallel tool calling is always disabled for the supervisor LLM.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allow the AI to perform multiple actions at once. Not applicable for Workflow agents — always leave unchecked for those.
CustomField.label: Enable Parallel Tool Calling
